definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: The young man bowed his head and bent over his ledger again.
sentences.chinese: 那個年輕人點頭應諾，然後又埋頭寫起分類帳。

sentences.english: Review general ledger and Financial Reports.
sentences.chinese: 審閱總分類帳和財務報告。

sentences.english: Looking for the current ledger balance, you can rigorously specify which balance you want.
sentences.chinese: 尋找當前的分類帳餘額，您可以精確指定想要的餘額。

sentences.english: Review and prepare final input in the General Ledger from various sources.
sentences.chinese: 審閱並準備從各種原始資料輸入總分類帳的最後數據。
